00023 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btConeShape : public btConvexInternalShape
00024 
00025 {
00026 
00027         btScalar m_sinAngle;
00028         btScalar m_radius;
00029         btScalar m_height;
00030         int             m_coneIndices[3];
00031         btVector3 coneLocalSupport(const btVector3& v) const;
00032 
00033 
00034 public:
00035         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00036         
00037         btConeShape (btScalar radius,btScalar height);
00038         
00039         virtual btVector3       localGetSupportingVertex(const btVector3& vec) const;
00040         virtual btVector3       localGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3& vec) const;
00041         virtual void    batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3* vectors,btVector3* supportVerticesOut,int numVectors) const;
00042 
00043         btScalar getRadius() const { return m_radius;}
00044         btScalar getHeight() const { return m_height;}
00045 
00046         void setRadius(const btScalar radius)
00047         {
00048                 m_radius = radius;
00049         }
00050         void setHeight(const btScalar height)
00051         {
00052                 m_height = height;
00053         }
00054 
00055 
00056         virtual void    calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00057         {
00058                 btTransform identity;
00059                 identity.setIdentity();
00060                 btVector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00061                 getAabb(identity,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00062 
00063                 btVector3 halfExtents = (aabbMax-aabbMin)*btScalar(0.5);
00064 
00065                 btScalar margin = getMargin();
00066 
00067                 btScalar lx=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.x()+margin);
00068                 btScalar ly=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.y()+margin);
00069                 btScalar lz=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.z()+margin);
00070                 const btScalar x2 = lx*lx;
00071                 const btScalar y2 = ly*ly;
00072                 const btScalar z2 = lz*lz;
00073                 const btScalar scaledmass = mass * btScalar(0.08333333);
00074 
00075                 inertia = scaledmass * (btVector3(y2+z2,x2+z2,x2+y2));
00076 
00077 //              inertia.x() = scaledmass * (y2+z2);
00078 //              inertia.y() = scaledmass * (x2+z2);
00079 //              inertia.z() = scaledmass * (x2+y2);
00080         }
00081 
00082 
00083                 virtual const char*     getName()const 
00084                 {
00085                         return "Cone";
00086                 }
00087                 
00089                 void    setConeUpIndex(int upIndex);
00090                 
00091                 int     getConeUpIndex() const
00092                 {
00093                         return m_coneIndices[1];
00094                 }
00095 
00096         virtual btVector3       getAnisotropicRollingFrictionDirection() const
00097         {
00098                 return btVector3 (0,1,0);
00099         }
00100 
00101         virtual void    setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling);
00102         
00103         
00104         virtual int     calculateSerializeBufferSize() const;
00105         
00107         virtual const char*     serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const;
00108         
00109 
00110 };

00153 struct  btConeShapeData
00154 {
00155         btConvexInternalShapeData       m_convexInternalShapeData;
00156         
00157         int     m_upIndex;
00158         
00159         char    m_padding[4];
00160 };
00161 
00162 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btConeShape::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00163 {
00164         return sizeof(btConeShapeData);
00165 }
00166 
00168 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btConeShape::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00169 {
00170         btConeShapeData* shapeData = (btConeShapeData*) dataBuffer;
00171 
00172         btConvexInternalShape::serialize(&shapeData->m_convexInternalShapeData,serializer);
00173 
00174         shapeData->m_upIndex = m_coneIndices[1];
00175 
00176         // Fill padding with zeros to appease msan.
00177         shapeData->m_padding[0] = 0;
00178         shapeData->m_padding[1] = 0;
00179         shapeData->m_padding[2] = 0;
00180         shapeData->m_padding[3] = 0;
00181 
00182         return "btConeShapeData";
00183 }
